name: Soren
long_description:
Vertical AI needs vertical evals.

Vertical AI applications are rapidly being adopted in real-world workflows. Yet thereâ€™s still no good way to rigorously evaluate their performance -- especially on complex, multi-step workflows.

Soren AI helps teams curate high-quality datasets and benchmarks and provides the infrastructure to run these evaluations end to end.

If you want to make your AI more reliable, book a time at: https://soren-ai.com/
one_liner: Domain-specific evals for your vertical AI
